metadata.dc:author: López Colón, J L
Navarro Serrano, I
Llorente Ballesteros, M T
metadata.dc:description: OBJECTIVE The aim of this report is to propose a scheme for validation of an analytical technique according to ISO 17025. MATERIAL AND METHODS According to ISO 17025, the fundamental parameters tested were: selectivity, calibration model, precision, accuracy, uncertainty of measurement, and analytical interference. RESULTS A protocol has been developed that has been applied successfully to quantify zinc in serum by atomic absorption spectrometry. CONCLUSION It is demonstrated that our method is selective, linear, accurate, and precise, making it suitable for use in routine diagnostics.
metadata.dc:subject: Validation
Acreditación
Serum zinc

ISO 17025
Cinc sérico
metadata.dc:title: Propuesta de un procedimiento de validación de un método para la determinación de cinc sérico: cumplimiento de los requisitos de la ISO 17025.
[Validation of an in-house method for the determination of zinc in serum: Meeting the requirements of ISO 17025].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista de calidad asistencial : organo de la Sociedad Espanola de Calidad Asistencial
